headline.main: PREMIER CONFIDENT; He Says Nazis Will Be Annihilated With U.S. and British Help LISTS REICH CASUALTIES Stalin Puts Them at 4,500,000, Soviet's at 1,748,000 -- Talks of Aim of Hess Flight STALIN FORECASTS NEW ALLIED FRONT

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Nov. 6 -- Addressing the Moscow Soviet on the twenty-fourth anniversary of the October Revolution in an atmosphere electric with suspense, Premier Joseph Stalin of the Soviet Union this evening for fifty-two minutes told his audience in a speech broadcast to the world that since Germany wanted a war of extermination "she will get that war."
